section.heading: District of Columbia State Athletic Association; membership.

para.text: All schools in the DCPS system with an interscholastic athletics program serving grades 9 to 12 shall be members of DCSAA and subject to its membership standards.

A public charter, parochial, or private school in the District with an interscholastic athletics program serving grades 9 to 12 that agrees to abide by DCSAA's membership standards and applicable District laws and regulations governing interscholastic athletics programs may become a DCSAA member and shall be subject to its membership standards.
The DCSAA shall develop and offer training guidance on District regulations necessary to achieve or maintain membership.

section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 21-263: § 301 of D.C. Law 21-263 provided that the creation of this section by § 109 of D.C. Law 21-263 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been given effect.
Section 7033 of D.C. Law 22-33 repealed § 301 of D.C. Law 21-263. Therefore the changes made to this section by D.C. Law 21-263 have been given effect.
